text:
To reproduce:

- disable uploads in local.build.properties
- go to site tab -> attachments
- click button "New Attachment" -> error message is displayed correctly
- click "Cancel"
- you end up on the "New Media Document" page again
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
BTW, the "Submit" button should be disabled or hidden if the usecase can't be
executed.
